desc: You have been Lavished with Love! Here at Lavish Carats we hold ourselves to the utmost standard of quality control. We are serious about our Clients & our Carats! We inspect & hand pick the finest stones and devotedly hand fashion and polish each piece with love and excellence to bring to you Lavish Luxury is gauran

layout.text: Lavishly Adorn Yourself In The Jewelry Of Your Dreams
